Posts.Content: Hi, I live only an hour away from you, Johnstown NY> Who is your oncologist? I go to NYOH at Albany Med and been Stage IV for 5 yrs. There are major ups and downs with this but what works for me is too stay as busy as possible and keep moving, we are all different and deal with things differently. I bought an ipod and listen to music to try to turn my mind off many times.
Posts.Title: Depression..
